mdq:check.name: Entity Format Present
mdq:check.description: Check that each entity has a format specified.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import java.util.ArrayList as ArrayList import metadig.variable as mvar
# A resource format is not present if 'resourceFormat' not in globals() or resourceFormat is None: output = "A resource format was not found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(resourceFormat)): output = "The resource format is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource identifier type is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(resourceFormat, str) or isinstance(resourceFormat, unicode)): output = "The resource format '{}' was found".format(resourceFormat) elif (isinstance(resourceFormat, ArrayList)): output = "The resource format '{}' was found (first of {} formats)".format(resourceFormat[0].strip(), resourceFormat.size()) else: output = "The resource format '{}' was found)".format(resourceFormat) status = "SUCCESS" return True
